links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..76
formula: Partial sums of A051674. - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 26 2007
mathematica: P3[n_] := Sum[Prime[i]^Prime[i], {i, 1, n}]; Table[P3[n], {n, 1, 10}] - _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Apr 29 2008Accumulate[#^#&/@Prime[Range[10]]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 10 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) a=n=0; forprime (p=2, 383, write("b061789.txt", n++, " ", a+=p^p)) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 28 2009
